trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered your 'partners' whom you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created from the earth, or have they partnership [with Him] in the heavens? Or have We given them a book so they are [standing] on evidence therefrom? [No], rather, the wrongdoers do not promise each other except delusion."
trans-unit.target: Sige, "har du overvejet dine partnere, hvem du påberåbe sig udover Allah? Vis mig, hvad de har lavet fra jorden, eller har de partnerskab [med ham] i himlen? Eller har vi givet dem en bog, så de står [klar] på dokumentation heraf? [Nej], snarere, at lovovertrædere må ikke løfte om hinanden undtagen illusion."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah holds the heavens and the earth, lest they cease. And if they should cease, no one could hold them [in place] after Him. Indeed, He is Forbearing and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Faktisk besidder Allah himlene og jorden, lest de ophøre. Og hvis de skal ophøre, ingen kunne holde dem [i stedet] efter ham. Ja, han er Forbearing og Forgiving.

trans-unit.source: And they swore by Allah their strongest oaths that if a warner came to them, they would be more guided than [any] one of the [previous] nations. But when a warner came to them, it did not increase them except in aversion.
trans-unit.target: Og de svor ved Allah deres stærkeste eder, at hvis en warner kom til dem, ville de være mere guidede end [enhver] en af de [forrige] nationer. Men når en warner kom til dem, det steg ikke dem undtagen i aversion.

trans-unit.source: [Due to] arrogance in the land and plotting of evil; but the evil plot does not encompass except its own people. Then do they await except the way of the former peoples? But you will never find in the way of Allah any change, and you will never find in the way of Allah any alteration.
trans-unit.target: [På grund af] arrogance i landet og plotning af det onde; men den onde plot omfatter ikke bortset fra sit eget folk. Så de venter undtagen måde af de tidligere folk? Men du vil aldrig finde i måde Allah enhver ændring, og du vil aldrig finde i vejen for Allah enhver ændring.

trans-unit.source: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? And they were greater than them in power. But Allah is not to be caused failure by anything in the heavens or on the earth. Indeed, He is ever Knowing and Competent.
trans-unit.target: Har de ikke rejste gennem landet og observeret, hvordan var i slutningen af dem før dem? Og de var større end dem i kraft. Men Allah er ikke at skyldes svigt af noget i himlen eller på jorden. Han er faktisk nogensinde vidende og kompetente.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for what they have earned, He would not leave upon the earth any creature. But He defers them for a specified term. And when their time comes, then indeed Allah has ever been, of His servants, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Og hvis Allah skulle pålægge skylden på folk for hvad de har tjent, han ikke ville forlade på jorden, enhver skabning. Men han udsætter dem for en bestemt periode. Og når deres tid kommer, så faktisk Allah har nogensinde været, af hans tjenere, Seeing.

trans-unit.source: Ya, Seen.
trans-unit.target: Ya, set.

trans-unit.source: By the wise Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Af den kloge Koranen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers,
trans-unit.target: Ja er du, [O Muhammad], blandt budbringere,

trans-unit.source: On a straight path.
trans-unit.target: På en lige vej.

trans-unit.source: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
trans-unit.target: [Det er] en åbenbaring af ophøjede i magt, barmhjertige,

trans-unit.source: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware.
trans-unit.target: At du kan advare et folk, hvis forfædre ikke blev advaret, så de er uvidende.

trans-unit.source: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Allerede er ordet trådt i kraft, efter at de fleste af dem, så de ikke tror.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft.
trans-unit.target: Faktisk har vi lænker om deres halse, og de er til deres chins, så de er med hoveder [holdt] vejrs.

trans-unit.source: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see.
trans-unit.target: Og vi har sat foran dem en barriere og bag dem en barriere og dækket dem, så de ikke kan se.

trans-unit.source: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.
trans-unit.target: Og det er alle de samme for dem om du advare dem eller ikke advare dem - de vil ikke tro.

trans-unit.source: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kun advare, der følger det budskab og frygt den mest barmhjertige ubeset. Så giv ham gode tidender om tilgivelse og ædle belønning.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register.
trans-unit.target: Faktisk, det er os, der bringe døde til liv og registrere hvad de har lagt frem, og hvad de efterlod, og alle ting vi har opregnet i et klart register.

trans-unit.source: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it -
trans-unit.target: Og forelægge dem et eksempel: folk i byen, når budbringere kom-

trans-unit.source: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you."
trans-unit.target: Når vi har sendt til dem, to men de nægtet dem, så vi styrket dem med en tredjedel, og de sagde: "Ja, vi er budbringere til dig."

trans-unit.source: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies."
trans-unit.target: De sagde, "du er ikke men mennesker som os, og den mest barmhjertige har ikke afsløret en ting. Du kun fortælle løgne."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you,
trans-unit.target: De sagde, "vor Herre ved, at vi er budbringere til dig,

trans-unit.source: And we are not responsible except for clear notification."
trans-unit.target: Og vi er ikke ansvarlige undtagen klar besked."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: De sagde, "Ja, vi finder du et dårligt varsel. Hvis du ikke afstå, vi vil helt sikkert sten du, og der vil helt sikkert røre dig, fra os, en smertefuld straf."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people."
trans-unit.target: De sagde: "din omen er med jer selv. Er det fordi du mindede? Snarere, du er et transgressing folk."

trans-unit.source: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Og der kom fra den fjerneste ende af byen en mand, kører. Han sagde, "O mit folk, Følg budbringere.

trans-unit.source: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Følge dem, der ikke spørger du [enhver] betaling, og de styres [rigtigt].

trans-unit.source: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned?
trans-unit.target: Og hvorfor skulle jeg ikke tilbede han der har skabt mig og hvem du vil blive sendt tilbage?

trans-unit.source: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me?
trans-unit.target: Skal jeg tage end ham [false] guder [mens], hvis den mest barmhjertige agter nemlig mig nogle modgang, deres forbøn ikke vil benytte mig på alle, eller kan de spare mig?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error.
trans-unit.target: Faktisk ville jeg så være i åbenbar fejl.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."
trans-unit.target: Ja, jeg har troet på din Herre, så Lyt til mig."

trans-unit.source: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know
trans-unit.target: Det blev sagt, "Enter paradis." Han sagde, "Jeg ønsker mit folk kunne vide

trans-unit.source: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored."
trans-unit.target: Hvordan min Herren har tilgivet mig og placerede mig blandt de hædret."

trans-unit.source: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so.
trans-unit.target: Og vi sende ikke over hans folk efter ham nogen soldater fra himlen, heller ville vi have gjort det.

trans-unit.source: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished.
trans-unit.target: Det var ikke men et råb, og straks de blev slukket.

trans-unit.source: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.
trans-unit.target: Hvordan beklageligt for ansatte. Der kom ikke til dem nogen messenger bortset fra at de plejede at håne ham.

trans-unit.source: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return?
trans-unit.target: Har de ikke overvejet hvor mange generationer vi ødelagt før dem - at de dem ikke vil vende tilbage?

trans-unit.source: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us.
trans-unit.target: Og ja, dem alle endnu kommer før os.

trans-unit.source: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat.
trans-unit.target: Og et tegn for dem er den døde jord. Vi har bragt det til livet og bragt frem fra det korn, og fra det de spiser.

trans-unit.source: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs -
trans-unit.target: Og vi placeret deri haver med palmer og vinstokke og forårsagede for at briste ud deraf nogle fjedre-

trans-unit.source: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful?
trans-unit.target: At de kan spise sin frugt. Og deres hænder ikke har fremlagt det, så vil de ikke være taknemmelig?

trans-unit.source: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know.
trans-unit.target: Ophøjet er ham, der skabte alle par - fra jorden vokser og fra sig selv og fra det, som de ikke kender.

trans-unit.source: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness.
trans-unit.target: Og et tegn for dem er natten. Vi fjerner fra it [lys] dag, så de er [tilbage] i mørket.

trans-unit.source: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Og solen løber [på vej] mod sit standsested. Der er bestemmelse af ophøjede i magt, at vide.

trans-unit.source: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk.
trans-unit.target: Og månen - vi har fastsat for det faser, indtil det vender tilbage [optræder] som gamle dato stilk.

trans-unit.source: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke tilladte for solen at nå månen, heller gør nat overhale dag, men hvert, i en bane, svømning.

trans-unit.source: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship.
trans-unit.target: Og et tegn for dem er, at vi gennemførte deres forfædre i en lastet skib.

trans-unit.source: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride.
trans-unit.target: Og vi lavet for dem fra holder af det, som de ride.

trans-unit.source: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved
trans-unit.target: Og hvis vi skulle give, vi kunne drukne dem; derefter ingen reagerer på et skrig der ville være for dem, eller ville de blive frelst

trans-unit.source: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time.
trans-unit.target: Undtagen som en nåde fra os og bestemmelse for en tid.

trans-unit.source: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy... "
trans-unit.target: Men når det er sagt til dem, "pas på hvad er før du, og hvad der ligger bag dig; måske vil du modtage nåde... "

trans-unit.source: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away.
trans-unit.target: Og ingen tegn kommer til dem fra tegnene på deres Herre, bortset fra at de er fra det drejning væk.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error."
trans-unit.target: Og når det er sagt til dem, "Tilbringe fra, som Allah har givet for dig," dem, der ikke tror sige til dem, der tror, "skal vi fodre en som hvis Allah havde villet, han ville have fodret? Du er ikke men i klare fejl."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Og de siger, "Hvornår er dette løfte, hvis du skulle være sandfærdig?"

trans-unit.source: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing.
trans-unit.target: De ikke afvente undtagen én blast, som vil gribe dem mens de bestrider.

trans-unit.source: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return.
trans-unit.target: Og de vil ikke være i stand [at give] enhver instruktion, eller at deres folk kan de afkast.

trans-unit.source: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten.
trans-unit.target: Og Afrikas Horn vil blive blæst; og på én gang fra grave til deres Herre, de vil fremskynde.

trans-unit.source: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth."
trans-unit.target: De vil sige, "O ve os! Der har rejst os op fra vores sovende sted?" [Svaret vil være], "Dette er, hvad den mest barmhjertige havde lovet, og budbringere fortalte sandheden."

trans-unit.source: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us.
trans-unit.target: Det vil ikke være, men en blast, og på én gang de alle bringes til stede før os.

trans-unit.source: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Så i dag ingen sjæl vil være krænket på alle, og du vil ikke være belønnes med undtagelse af hvad du plejede at gøre.

trans-unit.source: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -
trans-unit.target: Faktisk kammerater i paradis, at bliver underholdt i [glade] besættelse - dag,

trans-unit.source: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches.
trans-unit.target: De og deres ægtefæller - i skygge tilbagelænet på prydet sofaer.

trans-unit.source: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]
trans-unit.target: For dem er deri frugt, og for dem er hvad de anmode om [eller ønsker]

trans-unit.source: [And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord.
trans-unit.target: [Og] "Fred," et ord fra en barmhjertig Herren.

trans-unit.source: [Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals.
trans-unit.target: [Derefter vil han sige], "men stå fra hinanden i dag, du kriminelle.

trans-unit.source: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -
trans-unit.target: Jeg ikke pålægger dem, O børn af Adam, om, at du ikke tilbeder Satan - [for] faktisk, han er at du en klar fjende -

trans-unit.source: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Og at du tilbeder [kun] mig? Dette er en lige vej.

trans-unit.source: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?
trans-unit.target: Og han havde allerede ført på afveje fra jer meget af skabelse, så har du ikke bruge grund?

trans-unit.source: This is the Hellfire which you were promised.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den Hellfire, som du blev lovet.

trans-unit.source: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: [Angiv til] brænde deri i dag for hvad du har brugt til at nægte. "

trans-unit.source: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Dag, vi vil besegle over munden, og deres hænder vil tale til os, og deres fødder vil vidne om, hvad de bruges til at tjene.

trans-unit.source: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?
trans-unit.target: Og hvis vi villet, vi kunne have udslettet deres øjne, og de ville race [finde] vej, og hvordan kunne de Se?

trans-unit.source: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return.
trans-unit.target: Og hvis vi villet, vi kunne have deforme dem, [lammende dem] i deres steder så de kunne ikke fortsætte, og heller ikke kunne de vende tilbage.

trans-unit.source: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand?
trans-unit.target: Og han hvem vi giver lang levetid vi omvendt i skabelse; så vil de ikke forstår?

trans-unit.source: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Og vi gav ikke profeten Muhammad, kendskab til poesi, heller ikke er det sømmer sig for ham. Det er ikke, men en meddelelse og en klar Koranen

trans-unit.source: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: At advare enhver, som er i live og retfærdiggøre ord mod vantro.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?
trans-unit.target: Kan de ikke se at vi har skabt for dem fra hvad vores hænder har dannet, græssende husdyr, og [så] de er deres ejere?

trans-unit.source: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat.
trans-unit.target: Og vi har tæmmet dem for dem, så nogle af dem de ride, og nogle af dem de spiser.

trans-unit.source: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful?
trans-unit.target: Og for dem er deri [andre] fordele og drikkevarer, så vil de ikke være taknemmelig?

trans-unit.source: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped.
trans-unit.target: Men de truffet foruden Allah [false] guder at de måske ville blive hjulpet.

trans-unit.source: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.
trans-unit.target: De er ikke i stand til at hjælpe dem, og de [sig] er dem soldater til stede.

trans-unit.source: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare.
trans-unit.target: Så lad ikke deres tale bedrøve dig. Vi ved, hvad de skjule og hvad de erklære.

trans-unit.source: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary?
trans-unit.target: Mener man ikke at vi skabte ham fra en [alene] sæd-drop - så på én gang er han en klar modstander?

trans-unit.source: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated?"
trans-unit.target: Og han præsenterer for os et eksempel og glemmer sin [egen] skabelse. Han siger, "Hvem vil give liv til knogler mens de er opløst?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing."
trans-unit.target: Sige, "han vil give dem liv, der producerede dem første gang; og han er, af alle skabelse, Knowing. "

trans-unit.source: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite.
trans-unit.target: [Det er] Han, der har foretaget for dig fra det grønne træ, ild, og derefter fra det du antænde.

trans-unit.source: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator.
trans-unit.target: Er ikke ham, der skabt himlen og jorden købedygtig skabe holder af dem? Ja, [det er så]; og han er at kende skaberen.

trans-unit.source: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Hans kommando er kun hvornår han agter en ting, at han siger til det, "Være", og det er.

trans-unit.source: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Så ophøjet er han i hvis hånd er realm af alle ting, og til ham du vil blive returneret.

trans-unit.source: By those [angels] lined up in rows
trans-unit.target: Af disse [engle] linet op i rækker

trans-unit.source: And those who drive [the clouds]
trans-unit.target: Og dem, der kører [skyer]

trans-unit.source: And those who recite the message,
trans-unit.target: Og dem, der reciterer besked,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your God is One,
trans-unit.target: Ja, din Gud er én,

trans-unit.source: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.
trans-unit.target: Herre i himlene og jorden og, mellem dem og Herren af solopgange.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars
trans-unit.target: Ja, vi har prydet den nærmeste himlen med en udsmykning af stjerner

trans-unit.source: And as protection against every rebellious devil
trans-unit.target: Og som beskyttelse mod hver oprørske Djævelen

trans-unit.source: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,
trans-unit.target: [Så] kan ikke lytte til den ophøjede forsamling [af engle] og er overdængede fra hver side,

trans-unit.source: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,
trans-unit.target: Frastødende; og for dem er en konstant straf,

trans-unit.source: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].
trans-unit.target: Undtagen én der snupper [nogle ord] ved tyveri, men de er forfulgt af en brændende flamme, piercing [i lysstyrke].

trans-unit.source: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.
trans-unit.target: Derefter spørge dem, [O Muhammad], "er de en stærkere [eller vanskeligere] skabelse eller de [andre] har vi skabt?" Ja, vi skabt mænd fra klæbrig ler.

trans-unit.source: But you wonder, while they mock,
trans-unit.target: Men du spekulerer på, mens de håne,

trans-unit.source: And when they are reminded, they remember not.
trans-unit.target: Og når de bliver mindet, de husker ikke.

trans-unit.source: And when they see a sign, they ridicule
trans-unit.target: Og når de ser et tegn, de latterliggørelse

trans-unit.source: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.
trans-unit.target: Og sige, "det er ikke indlysende, men magi.

trans-unit.source: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
trans-unit.target: Når vi har døde og bliver støv og knogler, er vi faktisk at genopstå?

trans-unit.source: And our forefathers [as well]?"
trans-unit.target: Og vores forfædre [samt]?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."
trans-unit.target: Sige, "Ja, og du vil [gengives] foragtelig."

trans-unit.source: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.
trans-unit.target: Det bliver kun et råb, og på én gang de vil observere.

trans-unit.source: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: De vil sige, "O ve os! Dette er dagen af belønning."

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: [De vil blive fortalt], "Dette er dag i dommen, som du brugte til at nægte."

trans-unit.source: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship
trans-unit.target: [Englene vil blive bestilt], "samle dem, der har begået fejl, deres former, og hvad de bruges til at tilbede

trans-unit.source: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire
trans-unit.target: Andre end Allah, og guide dem til stien til Hellfire

trans-unit.source: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."
trans-unit.target: Og stoppe dem; faktisk, de er til at blive afhørt."

trans-unit.source: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"
trans-unit.target: [De vil blive bedt om], "Hvad er [forkert] med dig? Hvorfor du ikke hjælper hinanden?"

trans-unit.source: But they, that Day, are in surrender.
trans-unit.target: Men de, der dag, er i overgivelse.

trans-unit.source: And they will approach one another blaming each other.
trans-unit.target: Og de vil nærme sig hinanden skyde skylden på hinanden.

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."
trans-unit.target: De vil sige, "Ja, du brugte til at komme på os fra højre."

trans-unit.source: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,
trans-unit.target: Undertrykkerne vil sige, "hellere, du [dem] ikke var troende,

trans-unit.source: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.
trans-unit.target: Og vi havde over du ikke myndighed, men du var et transgressing folk.

trans-unit.source: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].
trans-unit.target: Så vores Herrens ord er trådt i kraft efter os; faktisk vil vi smage [straf].

trans-unit.source: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."
trans-unit.target: Og vi førte dig til afvigelse; Ja, vi var deviators."

trans-unit.source: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.
trans-unit.target: Så ja de, der dag, vil være at dele i straffen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Der er, hvordan vi behandler kriminelle.

trans-unit.source: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant
trans-unit.target: Faktisk var de, da det blev sagt til dem, "der er ingen guddom, men Allah," arrogant

trans-unit.source: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"
trans-unit.target: Og sagde, "Skal vi forlade vores guder for en gal digter?"

trans-unit.source: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.
trans-unit.target: Snarere, profeten er kommet med sandheden og bekræftet de [tidligere] budbringere.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,
trans-unit.target: Ja, du [vantro] vil være smagsdommere af den smertefulde straf,

trans-unit.source: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -
trans-unit.target: Og du vil ikke være belønnes med undtagelse af hvad du plejede at gøre-

trans-unit.source: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Men ikke de valgte tjenere af Allah.

trans-unit.source: Those will have a provision determined -
trans-unit.target: De vil have en bestemmelse fastsat-

trans-unit.source: Fruits; and they will be honored
trans-unit.target: Frugter; og de vil blive hædret

trans-unit.source: In gardens of pleasure
trans-unit.target: I haven af glæde

trans-unit.source: On thrones facing one another.
trans-unit.target: På troner står over for hinanden.

trans-unit.source: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,
trans-unit.target: Der vil blive rundsendt blandt dem en kop [af vin] fra en strømmende forår,

trans-unit.source: White and delicious to the drinkers;
trans-unit.target: Hvidt og lækkert at drikkende;

trans-unit.source: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.
trans-unit.target: Ingen dårlig effekt er der i det, og heller ikke fra det vil de blive beruset.

trans-unit.source: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,
trans-unit.target: Og med dem vil være kvinder begrænsende [deres] blikke, med store, [smukke] øjne,

trans-unit.source: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.
trans-unit.target: Som om de var [delikat] æg, godt beskyttet.

trans-unit.source: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.
trans-unit.target: Og de vil nærme sig hinanden, spørgende på hinanden.

trans-unit.source: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]
trans-unit.target: En højttaler blandt dem vil sige, "Jeg havde faktisk en følgesvend [til jorden]

trans-unit.source: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe
trans-unit.target: Hvem ville sige, "er du faktisk af dem, der mener,

trans-unit.source: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"
trans-unit.target: At når vi har døde og bliver støv og knogler, vil vi faktisk være belønnes?'"

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"
trans-unit.target: Han vil sige, "ville du [pleje til] kig?"

trans-unit.source: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Og han vil se og se ham midt i Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.
trans-unit.target: Han vil sige: "ved Allah, du næsten ruineret mig.

trans-unit.source: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke til fordel for min herre, jeg ville have været dem bragt [til helvede].

trans-unit.source: Then, are we not to die
trans-unit.target: Så er vi ikke til at dø

trans-unit.source: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"
trans-unit.target: Bortset fra vores første død, og vi vil ikke blive straffet?"

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Det er faktisk stor opfyldelsen.

trans-unit.source: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.
trans-unit.target: For lignende af denne lad arbejde arbejdstagere [til jorden].

trans-unit.source: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?
trans-unit.target: Er paradis træet af zaqqum eller en bedre bolig?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Ja, vi har gjort det en pinsel for lovovertrædere.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,
trans-unit.target: Faktisk er det et træ udstedelse fra bunden af Hellfire,

trans-unit.source: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.
trans-unit.target: Dens nye frugt som om det var stats-og djævle.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.
trans-unit.target: Og ja, de vil spise fra det og fylde med det deres maver.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.
trans-unit.target: Så ja, vil de have efter det en blanding af skoldning vand.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Så faktisk, vil deres tilbagevenden være at helvede.

trans-unit.source: Indeed they found their fathers astray.
trans-unit.target: Faktisk fandt de deres fædre på afveje.

trans-unit.source: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.
trans-unit.target: Så skyndte de sig [at følge] i deres fodspor.

trans-unit.source: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,
trans-unit.target: Og der allerede havde forvildet sig før dem de fleste af de tidligere folk,

trans-unit.source: And We had already sent among them warners.
trans-unit.target: Og vi havde allerede sendt blandt dem warners.

trans-unit.source: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -
trans-unit.target: Derefter se hvordan var slutningen af dem, der blev advaret -

trans-unit.source: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Men ikke de valgte tjenere af Allah.

trans-unit.source: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.
trans-unit.target: Og Noah havde bestemt kaldte os, og [vi er] bedst af respondenter.

trans-unit.source: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.
trans-unit.target: Og vi frelst ham og hans familie fra den store trængsel.

trans-unit.source: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]
trans-unit.target: Og vi lavede hans efterkommere de resterende [til jorden]

trans-unit.source: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
trans-unit.target: Og til venstre for ham [positiv omtale] blandt senere generationer:

trans-unit.source: "Peace upon Noah among the worlds."
trans-unit.target: "Fred på Noah blandt verdens."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Faktisk, belønner vi således magtsyge af god.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
trans-unit.target: Han var faktisk vores troende ansatte.

trans-unit.source: Then We drowned the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Så vi druknede vantro.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,
trans-unit.target: Og ja, blandt sin form var Abraham,

trans-unit.source: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart
trans-unit.target: Da han kom til sin herre med en sunde hjerte

trans-unit.source: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?
trans-unit.target: [Og] da han sagde, at hans far og hans folk, "Hvad har du tilbeder?

trans-unit.source: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?
trans-unit.target: Er det løgn [som] guder end Allah du ønsker?

trans-unit.source: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"
trans-unit.target: Så hvad er dine tanker om Herren of the worlds?"

trans-unit.source: And he cast a look at the stars
trans-unit.target: Og han kastede et blik på stjernerne

trans-unit.source: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."
trans-unit.target: Og sagde: "Ja, jeg [vil blive] syg."

trans-unit.source: So they turned away from him, departing.
trans-unit.target: Så de vendte sig bort fra ham, afgår.

trans-unit.source: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?
trans-unit.target: Så han vendte til deres guder og sagde: "du ikke spiser?

trans-unit.source: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"
trans-unit.target: Hvad er [forkert] med dig, at du ikke taler?"

trans-unit.source: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.
trans-unit.target: Og han viste dem et slag med [sin] højre hånd.

trans-unit.source: Then the people came toward him, hastening.
trans-unit.target: Så folk kom mod ham, fremskynde.

trans-unit.source: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,
trans-unit.target: Han sagde, "har du tilbeder, som du [dem] snitte,

trans-unit.source: While Allah created you and that which you do?"
trans-unit.target: Mens Allah skabte dig og det, som du gør?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."
trans-unit.target: De sagde, "Konstruere for ham en ovn og smide ham ind i den brændende ild."

trans-unit.source: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.
trans-unit.target: Og de er bestemt for ham en plan, men vi gjorde dem den mest fornedret.

trans-unit.source: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.
trans-unit.target: Og [så] han sagde, "Ja, jeg vil gå til [hvor jeg er bestilt af] min herre; Han vil lede mig.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Herre, Giv mig [barn] blandt retfærdige."

trans-unit.source: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.
trans-unit.target: Så vi gav ham gode tidender om et overbærende dreng.

trans-unit.source: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."
trans-unit.target: Og da han nåede med ham [alder] anstrengelse, sagde han, "O min søn, ja jeg har set i en drøm, at jeg [skal] ofrer dig, så se, hvad du mener." Han sagde, "O min far, gør som du befalede. Du vil finde mig, hvis Allah testamenter, af den standhaftige."

trans-unit.source: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,
trans-unit.target: Og da de havde begge indsendt og han satte ham på hans pande,

trans-unit.source: We called to him, "O Abraham,
trans-unit.target: Vi kaldte ham, "O Abraham,

trans-unit.source: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Du har opfyldt visionen." Faktisk, belønner vi således magtsyge af god.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this was the clear trial.
trans-unit.target: Dette var faktisk klart retssagen.

trans-unit.source: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,
trans-unit.target: Og vi forløste ham med et stort offer,

trans-unit.source: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
trans-unit.target: Og vi forlod for ham [positiv omtale] blandt senere generationer:

trans-unit.source: "Peace upon Abraham."
trans-unit.target: "Fred på Abraham."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Faktisk, belønner vi således magtsyge af god.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
trans-unit.target: Han var faktisk vores troende ansatte.

trans-unit.source: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.
trans-unit.target: Og vi gav ham gode tidender om Isaac, en profet blandt retfærdige.

trans-unit.source: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.
trans-unit.target: Og vi velsignede ham og Isak. Men blandt deres efterkommere er handlingsmenneske af god og den klart uretfærdig til sig selv.

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.
trans-unit.target: Og vi helt sikkert giver fordel ved Moses og Aron.

trans-unit.source: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,
trans-unit.target: Og vi gemte dem og deres folk fra den store trængsel,

trans-unit.source: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.
trans-unit.target: Og vi støttede dem, så det var dem, der overvandt.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,
trans-unit.target: Og vi gav dem eksplicit Skriften,

trans-unit.source: And We guided them on the straight path.
trans-unit.target: Og vi guidede dem på den lige vej.

trans-unit.source: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:
trans-unit.target: Og vi forlod for dem [positiv omtale] blandt senere generationer:

trans-unit.source: "Peace upon Moses and Aaron."
trans-unit.target: "Fred på Moses og Aron."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Faktisk, belønner vi således magtsyge af god.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.
trans-unit.target: De var faktisk vores troende ansatte.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,
trans-unit.target: Og ja, Elias var blandt budbringere,

trans-unit.source: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?
trans-unit.target: Da han sagde, at hans folk, "ikke vil du frygte Allah?

trans-unit.source: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -
trans-unit.target: Opfordrer Ba'l og forlade bedst af skabere -

trans-unit.source: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"
trans-unit.target: Allah, jeres Herre og Herren af din første forfædre?"

trans-unit.source: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],
trans-unit.target: Og de nægtede ham, så ja, de vil blive bragt [for straf],

trans-unit.source: Except the chosen servants of Allah.
trans-unit.target: Bortset fra de valgte tjenere af Allah.

trans-unit.source: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
trans-unit.target: Og vi forlod for ham [positiv omtale] blandt senere generationer:

trans-unit.source: "Peace upon Elias."
trans-unit.target: "Fred på Elias."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Faktisk, belønner vi således magtsyge af god.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
trans-unit.target: Han var faktisk vores troende ansatte.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Og ja, mange var blandt budbringere.

trans-unit.source: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,
trans-unit.target: [Så nævne] når vi frelst ham og hans familie, alle,

trans-unit.source: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].
trans-unit.target: Bortset fra hans kone blandt dem, der forblev [med Misdædere].

trans-unit.source: Then We destroyed the others.
trans-unit.target: Så vi ødelagt de andre.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning
trans-unit.target: Og ja, du går forbi dem i morgen

trans-unit.source: And at night. Then will you not use reason?
trans-unit.target: Og om natten. Så vil du ikke bruge grund?

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Og ja, Jonas var blandt budbringere.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.
trans-unit.target: [Omtale] da han løb væk for det lastede skib.

trans-unit.source: And he drew lots and was among the losers.
trans-unit.target: Og han trak masser og var blandt taberne.

trans-unit.source: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.
trans-unit.target: Derefter slugte fisken ham, mens han var forkasteligt.

trans-unit.source: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,
trans-unit.target: Og hvis han ikke havde været for dem, der ophøje Allah,

trans-unit.source: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Han ville være forblevet inde dens mave indtil den dag, de er genoplivet.

trans-unit.source: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.
trans-unit.target: Men vi kastede ham ind på den åbne kyst, mens han var syg.

trans-unit.source: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.
trans-unit.target: Og vi forårsaget for at vokse over ham en centnergræskar vinstok.

trans-unit.source: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.
trans-unit.target: Og vi sendte ham til [hans folk af] hundrede tusind eller mere.

trans-unit.source: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.
trans-unit.target: Og de troede, så vi gav dem livsglæde [] for en tid.

trans-unit.source: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?
trans-unit.target: Så spørge dem [O Muhammad], "Herren har døtre mens de har sønner?

trans-unit.source: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"
trans-unit.target: Eller vi skabe englene som kvinder, mens de var vidner?"

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,
trans-unit.target: Uden tvivl, er det ud af deres [opfundet] løgn, som de siger,

trans-unit.source: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.
trans-unit.target: "Allah har avlet", og de er løgnere.

trans-unit.source: Has He chosen daughters over sons?
trans-unit.target: Har han valgt døtre over sønner?

trans-unit.source: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?
trans-unit.target: Hvad er [forkert] med dig? Hvordan gør du dom?

trans-unit.source: Then will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Derefter vil du ikke blive mindet?

trans-unit.source: Or do you have a clear authority?
trans-unit.target: Eller har du en klar myndighed?

trans-unit.source: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.
trans-unit.target: Derefter producere din Skriften, hvis du skulle være sandfærdig.

trans-unit.source: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].
trans-unit.target: Og de har hævdet mellem ham og jinn en slægt, men jinn har allerede kendt, at de, [der har foretaget sådanne påstande] vil blive bragt til [straf].

trans-unit.source: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,
trans-unit.target: Ophøjet er Allah over hvad de beskriver,

trans-unit.source: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].
trans-unit.target: Bortset fra de valgte tjenere af Allah [som ikke deler i denne synd].

trans-unit.source: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,
trans-unit.target: Så ja, du [vantro] og uanset hvad du tilbeder,

trans-unit.source: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke friste [alle] fra ham

trans-unit.source: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Medmindre han, hvem der skal [Angiv og] brænde i Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.
trans-unit.target: [Engle sige], "der er ikke blandt os noget bortset fra at han har en kendt position.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].
trans-unit.target: Og ja, vi er dem, der linje op [for bøn].

trans-unit.source: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."
trans-unit.target: Og ja, vi er dem der ophøje Allah. "

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,
trans-unit.target: Og ja, de vantro, plejede at sige,

trans-unit.source: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,
trans-unit.target: "Hvis vi havde en besked fra [de] de tidligere folk,

trans-unit.source: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."
trans-unit.target: Vi ville have været de valgte tjenere af Allah."

trans-unit.source: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Men de disbelieved i det, så de vil vide.

trans-unit.source: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,
trans-unit.target: Og vores ord har allerede forud for vores tjenere, budbringere,

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory
trans-unit.target: [At] ja, de ville være dem givet sejr

trans-unit.source: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.
trans-unit.target: Og [at] ja, vores soldater vil være dem, der overvinde.

trans-unit.source: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.
trans-unit.target: Så, [O Muhammad], lad dem for en tid.

trans-unit.source: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.
trans-unit.target: Og se [hvad vil overgå] dem, for de skal se.

trans-unit.source: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?
trans-unit.target: Så for vores straf er de utålmodige?

trans-unit.source: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.
trans-unit.target: Men når det nedstammer i deres område, så onde er om morgenen af dem, der blev advaret.

trans-unit.source: And leave them for a time.
trans-unit.target: Og lade dem for en tid.

trans-unit.source: And see, for they are going to see.
trans-unit.target: Og se, for de skal se.

trans-unit.source: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Ophøjet er din Herre, Lord of might, over hvad de beskriver.

trans-unit.source: And peace upon the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Og fred på budbringere.

trans-unit.source: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Og ros til Allah, Herren af verdens.

trans-unit.source: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder...
trans-unit.target: Trist. Af Koranen indeholder påmindelse...

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension.
trans-unit.target: Men dem, der ikke tror er i stolthed og uenighed.

trans-unit.source: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mange en generation har vi ødelagt før dem, og de [så] kaldes; men det var ikke en gang for at flygte.

trans-unit.source: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar.
trans-unit.target: Og de spørger mig selv, at der er kommet til dem en warner blandt selv. Og vantro siger, "Dette er en tryllekunstner og en løgner.

trans-unit.source: Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing."
trans-unit.target: Har han gjort guderne [kun] en Gud? Ja, dette er en nysgerrig ting."

trans-unit.source: And the eminent among them went forth, [saying], "Continue, and be patient over [the defense of] your gods. Indeed, this is a thing intended.
trans-unit.target: Og de fremtrædende blandt dem gik frem, [siger], "Fortsæt, og være tålmodig over [forsvar af] din guder. Dette er faktisk noget bestemt.

trans-unit.source: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication.
trans-unit.target: Vi har ikke hørt om dette i den nyeste religion. Dette er ikke men en fabrikation.

trans-unit.source: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment.
trans-unit.target: Er budskabet blevet afsløret ham ud af [alle] os? " Snarere, de er i tvivl om min besked. Tværtimod har de endnu ikke smagt min straf.

trans-unit.source: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower?
trans-unit.target: Eller har de depoter af nåde i din Herre, ophøjede i magt, Bestower?

trans-unit.source: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend through [any] ways of access.
trans-unit.target: Eller er deres herredømme af himlene og jorden og hvad der er mellem dem? Så lad dem stige op gennem [enhver] måder af adgang.

trans-unit.source: [They are but] soldiers [who will be] defeated there among the companies [of disbelievers].
trans-unit.target: [De er men] soldater, [der er] besejrede der blandt virksomheder [af vantro].

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied before them, and [the tribe of] 'Aad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes,
trans-unit.target: Folk Noah nægtede foran dem, og [stamme]» ald og Farao, ejeren af indsatser,

trans-unit.source: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies.
trans-unit.target: Og [stamme] Thamud og masse folk og ledsagere af krat. Disse er selskaberne.

trans-unit.source: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified.
trans-unit.target: Hver af dem nægtet budbringere, så min straf var berettiget.

trans-unit.source: And these [disbelievers] await not but one blast [of the Horn]; for it there will be no delay.
trans-unit.target: Og disse [vantro] venter ikke, men en blast [af Horn]; for det der bliver ingen forsinkelser.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account"
trans-unit.target: Og de siger, "Vorherre, fremskynde for os vores andel [af straf] før dagen for konto"

trans-unit.source: Be patient over what they say and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; indeed, he was one who repeatedly turned back [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Være patient over hvad de siger og husk vores tjener, David, besidderen af styrke; Ja, han var en, der gentagne gange vendte tilbage [til Allah].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We subjected the mountains [to praise] with him, exalting [Allah] in the [late] afternoon and [after] sunrise.
trans-unit.target: Ja, vi udsat bjerge [at rose] med ham aandsvækkende [Allah] [sen] om eftermiddagen og [efter] sunrise.

trans-unit.source: And the birds were assembled, all with him repeating [praises].
trans-unit.target: Og fuglene blev samlet, alle med ham gentage [roser].

trans-unit.source: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech.
trans-unit.target: Og vi styrket sit rige og gav ham visdom og dømmekraft i tale.

trans-unit.source: And has there come to you the news of the adversaries, when they climbed over the wall of [his] prayer chamber -
trans-unit.target: Og er der kommet til dig nyheder af modstandere, da de kravlede over muren af [sin] bøn kammer-

trans-unit.source: When they entered upon David and he was alarmed by them? They said, "Fear not. [We are] two adversaries, one of whom has wronged the other, so judge between us with truth and do not exceed [it] and guide us to the sound path.
trans-unit.target: Da de kom ind på David og han var foruroliget over dem? De sagde: "frygt ikke. [Vi er] to modstandere, hvoraf den ene har krænket den anden, så dømme mellem os med sandheden og ikke overstiger [det] og guide os til den sunde vej.

trans-unit.source: Indeed this, my brother, has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe; so he said, 'Entrust her to me,' and he overpowered me in speech."
trans-unit.target: Faktisk dette, min bror har nioghalvfems moderfår, og jeg har et moderfår; så sagde han, «Overlade hende til mig», og han overmandede mig i tale."

trans-unit.source: [David] said, "He has certainly wronged you in demanding your ewe [in addition] to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became certain that We had tried him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing [in prostration] and turned in repentance [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: [David] sagde, "han har helt sikkert krænket dig i krævende din ewe [endvidere] til sin moderfår. Og ja, mange associates undertrykke hinanden, bortset fra dem, der tror og gøre retfærdige gerninger - og få er de." Og David blev sikkert, at vi havde prøvet ham, og han spurgte tilgivelse for sin herre og faldt ned bukkende [i udmattelse] og vendte i omvendelse [til Allah].

trans-unit.source: So We forgave him that; and indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.
trans-unit.target: Så tilgav vi ham og ja, for ham er nærhed til os og et godt sted til at vende tilbage.

trans-unit.source: [We said], "O David, indeed We have made you a successor upon the earth, so judge between the people in truth and do not follow [your own] desire, as it will lead you astray from the way of Allah." Indeed, those who go astray from the way of Allah will have a severe punishment for having forgotten the Day of Account.
trans-unit.target: [Vi sagde], "O David, faktisk har vi gjort dig en efterfølger på jorden, så dømme mellem mennesker i sandheden og ikke følger [din egen] ønske, som det vil føre dig på afveje fra måde Allah." Ja, vil dem, der går på afveje fra måde Allah har en alvorlig straf for at have glemt den dag konto.

trans-unit.source: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and that between them aimlessly. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve, so woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Og vi skabe ikke himlen og jorden, og at mellem dem planløst. Det er antagelsen af dem, der ikke tror, så ve dem, der ikke tror fra ilden.

trans-unit.source: Or should we treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like corrupters in the land? Or should We treat those who fear Allah like the wicked?
trans-unit.target: Eller skal vi behandle dem, som tror og gøre retfærdige gerninger som corrupters i landet? Eller skal vi behandle dem, der frygter Allah som den onde?

trans-unit.source: [This is] a blessed Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that they might reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded.
trans-unit.target: [Det er] en velsignet bog, som vi har åbenbaret for dig, [O Muhammad], at de kan reflektere over sit vers, og at de af forståelse vil blive mindet om.

trans-unit.source: And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Og David vi gav Salomon. En fremragende ansat, faktisk var han en gentagne gange vender tilbage [til Allah].

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when there were exhibited before him in the afternoon the poised [standing] racehorses.
trans-unit.target: [Omtale] når der var udstillet før ham i eftermiddag klar [står] væddeløbsheste.

trans-unit.source: And he said, "Indeed, I gave preference to the love of good [things] over the remembrance of my Lord until the sun disappeared into the curtain [of darkness]."
trans-unit.target: Og han sagde, "Ja, jeg gav præference til kærligheden til god [ting] over erindringen om min herre indtil solen forsvandt ind i forhænget [af mørket]."

trans-unit.source: [He said], "Return them to me," and set about striking [their] legs and necks.
trans-unit.target: [Han sagde], "Returnere dem til mig", og sæt om slående [deres] ben og hals.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly tried Solomon and placed on his throne a body; then he returned.
trans-unit.target: Og vi helt sikkert prøvet Solomon og placeret på hans trone et organ; derefter vendte han tilbage.

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower."
trans-unit.target: Han sagde, "min herre, tilgiv mig og give mig et Kongerige som ikke vil tilhører nogen efter mig. Ja, du er Bestower."

trans-unit.source: So We subjected to him the wind blowing by his command, gently, wherever he directed,
trans-unit.target: Så vi udsat for ham vinden blæser af hans kommando, forsigtigt, uanset hvor han instrueret,

trans-unit.source: And [also] the devils [of jinn] - every builder and diver
trans-unit.target: Og [også] djævle [af jinn] - hver builder og dykker

trans-unit.source: And others bound together in shackles.
trans-unit.target: Og andre bundet sammen i lænker.

trans-unit.source: [We said], "This is Our gift, so grant or withhold without account."
trans-unit.target: [Vi sagde], "Dette er vores gave, så give eller tilbageholde uden konto."

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.
trans-unit.target: Og ja, for ham er nærhed til os og et godt sted til at vende tilbage.

trans-unit.source: And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, Satan has touched me with hardship and torment."
trans-unit.target: Og husk vores tjener Job, da han ringede til sin herre, "Ja, Satan har rørt mig med modgang og pine."

trans-unit.source: [So he was told], "Strike [the ground] with your foot; this is a [spring for] a cool bath and drink."
trans-unit.target: [Så var han fortalte], "Strike [jorden] med din fod; Dette er en [foråret for] et køligt bad og drink. "

trans-unit.source: And We granted him his family and a like [number] with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Og vi gav ham, hans familie og en lignende [nummer] med dem som nåde fra os og en påmindelse til dem af forståelse.

trans-unit.source: [We said], "And take in your hand a bunch [of grass] and strike with it and do not break your oath." Indeed, We found him patient, an excellent servant. Indeed, he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: [Vi sagde], "Og tage i hånden en flok [af græs] og strike med det og ikke bryde din ed." Ja, vi fandt ham patient, en fremragende tjener. Han var faktisk én gentagne gange vender tilbage [til Allah].

trans-unit.source: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and [religious] vision.
trans-unit.target: Og husk vores tjenere, Abraham, Isak og Jakob - styrke og [religiøse] vision.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home [of the Hereafter].
trans-unit.target: Ja, vi valgte dem for en eksklusiv kvalitet: erindringen om hjemmet [af hinsidige].

trans-unit.source: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding.
trans-unit.target: Og ja de er, til os, blandt de valgte og udestående.

trans-unit.source: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding.
trans-unit.target: Og husk Ismael, Elisha og Dhul-Kifl, og alle er blandt de fremragende.

trans-unit.source: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return
trans-unit.target: Dette er en påmindelse. Og ja, til retfærdige er et godt sted til at vende tilbage

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them.
trans-unit.target: Haver af permanent opholdstilladelse, hvis døre vil være åbnet for dem.

trans-unit.source: Reclining within them, they will call therein for abundant fruit and drink.
trans-unit.target: Liggende inden for dem, vil de kalde deri for rigelige frugt og drikke.

trans-unit.source: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances and of equal age.
trans-unit.target: Og med dem vil være kvinder begrænsende [deres] blikke og af samme alder.

trans-unit.source: This is what you, [the righteous], are promised for the Day of Account.
trans-unit.target: Dette er, hvad du, [retfærdige], lovede for dag konto.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is Our provision; for it there is no depletion.
trans-unit.target: Dette er faktisk vores bestemmelse; for det er der ingen udtynding.

trans-unit.source: This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return -
trans-unit.target: Det [er]. Men ja, for overtræderne er et onde sted afkast-

trans-unit.source: Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: Helvede, som de vil [enter til] brænde og elendige er hvilested.

trans-unit.source: This - so let them taste it - is scalding water and [foul] purulence.
trans-unit.target: Dette - så lad dem smage det - skoldning vand og [fejl] purulence.

trans-unit.source: And other [punishments] of its type [in various] kinds.
trans-unit.target: Og andre [straffe] af sin type [i forskellige] former.

trans-unit.source: [Its inhabitants will say], "This is a company bursting in with you. No welcome for them. Indeed, they will burn in the Fire."
trans-unit.target: [Dens indbyggere vil sige], "Dette er en kompagni sprængfyldt med dig. Ingen velkommen til dem. Ja, de vil brænde i ilden."

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, [our leaders], brought this upon us, and wretched is the settlement."
trans-unit.target: De vil sige, "og heller ikke dig! Ingen velkommen til dig. Du, [vores ledere], bragt dette til os, og elendige er forliget."

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire."
trans-unit.target: De vil sige, "vor Herre, hvem bragt dette til os - øge for ham dobbelt straf i ilden."

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst?
trans-unit.target: Og de vil sige, "hvorfor vi ikke ser mænd, som vi plejede at tælle blandt værste?

trans-unit.source: Is it [because] we took them in ridicule, or has [our] vision turned away from them?"
trans-unit.target: Er det [fordi] vi tog dem i latterliggørelse, eller har [vores] vision vendte sig bort fra dem?"

trans-unit.source: Indeed, that is truth - the quarreling of the people of the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Der er faktisk sandheden - skændes for befolkningen i ilden.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: Sige, [O Muhammad], "Jeg er kun en warner, og der er ikke nogen guddom bortset fra Allah, den ene, Prevailing.

trans-unit.source: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver."
trans-unit.target: Herre i himlene og jorden og hvad der er mellem dem, ophøjede i magt, den evige Forgiver."

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is great news
trans-unit.target: Sige, "det er store nyheder

trans-unit.source: From which you turn away.
trans-unit.target: Hvorfra du tænder væk.

trans-unit.source: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam].
trans-unit.target: Jeg havde ingen viden om den ophøjede forsamling [af engle] når de stridende [Adams skabelse].

trans-unit.source: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke blevet afsløret mig bortset fra at jeg er en klar warner."

trans-unit.source: [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay.
trans-unit.target: [Så nævne] da Herren sagde til englene, "Ja, jeg vil oprette et menneske fra ler.

trans-unit.source: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
trans-unit.target: Så når jeg har velproportioneret ham og åndede ind i ham af min [oprettede] sjæl, derefter falde til ham i udmattelse."

trans-unit.source: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely.
trans-unit.target: Så bukkede englene - alle af dem helt.

trans-unit.source: Except Iblees; he was arrogant and became among the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Undtagen Iblees; Han er arrogant og blev blandt vantro.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "O Iblees, what prevented you from prostrating to that which I created with My hands? Were you arrogant [then], or were you [already] among the haughty?"
trans-unit.target: [Allah] sagde, "O Iblees, hvad forhindret dig fra prostrating, som jeg lavet med mine hænder? Var du arrogant [så], eller var du [allerede] blandt de hovmodige?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay."
trans-unit.target: Han sagde, "Jeg er bedre end ham. Du har skabt mig fra ilden og skabt ham fra ler."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Then get out of Paradise, for indeed, you are expelled.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] sagde, "så får ud af paradis, for ja, du er bortvist.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: Og ja, ved du er min forbandelse indtil dag af belønning."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
trans-unit.target: Han sagde, "Min herre, derefter benåde mig indtil den dag, de er genoplivet."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
trans-unit.target: [Allah] sagde, "så ja, du er af dem benådet

trans-unit.source: Until the Day of the time well-known."
trans-unit.target: Indtil dag i den tid kendte."

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "By your might, I will surely mislead them all
trans-unit.target: [Iblees] sagde, "af din magt, jeg vil helt sikkert vildlede dem alle

trans-unit.source: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
trans-unit.target: Undtagen, blandt dem, din valgte tjenere."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "The truth [is My oath], and the truth I say -
trans-unit.target: [Allah] sagde, "sandheden [er min ed], og sandheden jeg sige -

trans-unit.source: [That] I will surely fill Hell with you and those of them that follow you all together."
trans-unit.target: [Der] Jeg vil helt sikkert fylde helvede med dig og de af dem, der følger dig alle sammen."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for the Qur'an any payment, and I am not of the pretentious
trans-unit.target: Sige, [O Muhammad], "jeg ikke beder du om Koranen nogen betaling, og jeg ikke er af den prætentiøs

trans-unit.source: It is but a reminder to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Det er en påmindelse til verdener.

trans-unit.source: And you will surely know [the truth of] its information after a time."
trans-unit.target: Og du vil helt sikkert vide [sandheden af] dens oplysninger efter en tid. "

trans-unit.source: The revelation of the Qur'an is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Åbenbaringen af Koranen er fra Allah, ophøjede i magt, klogt.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have sent down to you the Book, [O Muhammad], in truth. So worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.
trans-unit.target: Faktisk har vi sendt til dig bogen, [O Muhammad], i sandhed. Så tilbede Allah, [der] oprigtig til ham i religion.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, for Allah is the pure religion. And those who take protectors besides Him [say], "We only worship them that they may bring us nearer to Allah in position." Indeed, Allah will judge between them concerning that over which they differ. Indeed, Allah does not guide he who is a liar and [confirmed] disbeliever.
trans-unit.target: Utvivlsomt, for Allah er den rene religion. Og dem, der tager beskyttere foruden ham [siger], "Vi har kun tilbeder dem, at de kan bringe os tættere på Allah i holdning." Faktisk, Allah vil dømme mellem dem om det, som adskiller de sig. Faktisk Allah ikke guide ham, der er en løgner og [bekræftet] vantro.

trans-unit.source: If Allah had intended to take a son, He could have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed. Exalted is He; He is Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Allah havde til hensigt at tage en søn, han kunne have valgt fra hvad han skaber, hvad han vilde. Ophøjet er han; Han er Allah, den ene, Prevailing.

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens and earth in truth. He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. Unquestionably, He is the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.
trans-unit.target: Han skabte himlen og jorden i sandhed. Han wraps natten over dagen og wraps dagen over natten og er underkastet solen og månen, hver kører [sit kursus] for en bestemt periode. Ingen tvivl om, han er ophøjede i magt, den evige Forgiver.

trans-unit.source: He created you from one soul. Then He made from it its mate, and He produced for you from the grazing livestock eight mates. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, within three darknesses. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs dominion. There is no deity except Him, so how are you averted?
trans-unit.target: Han skabte dig fra én sjæl. Derefter han fremstillet af det sin makker, og han producerede for dig fra de græssende husdyr otte hjælpere. Han opretter du i din mødre, oprettelse efter oprettelsen, inden for tre nysgerig skød. Det er Allah, jeres Herre; Ham tilhører herredømme. Der er ingen guddom undtagen ham, så hvordan er du afværget?

trans-unit.source: If you disbelieve - indeed, Allah is Free from need of you. And He does not approve for His servants disbelief. And if you are grateful, He approves it for you; and no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you about what you used to do. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke tror - ja, er Allah gratis fra nødvendigheden af dig. Og han godkender ikke for sine tjenere vantro. Og hvis du er taknemmelig, han godkender det for dig; og ingen bærer af byrder vil bære byrden af en anden. Derefter til din herre er dit afkast, og han vil informere dig om hvad du plejede at gøre. Han jo vide at i brysterne.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to Him [alone]; then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself, he forgets Him whom he called upon before, and he attributes to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for a little; indeed, you are of the companions of the Fire."
trans-unit.target: Og når modgang rører mand, han opfordrer sin herre, henvender sig til ham [alene]; så når han skænker ham en tjeneste fra sig, glemmer han ham, hvem han opfordrede før, og han tilskriver til Allah ligemænd til at vildlede [folk] fra sin vej. Sige, "nyde din vantro for lidt; du faktisk af ledsagerne af ilden."

trans-unit.source: Is one who is devoutly obedient during periods of the night, prostrating and standing [in prayer], fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, [like one who does not]? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Only they will remember [who are] people of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Er en der er andægtig lydig i perioder om natten, prostrating og stående [i bøn], af frygt for hinsidige og håbet om nåde af hans herre, [som en, der ikke]? Sige, "Er dem, der kender svarende til dem, der ikke kender?" Kun de vil huske, [der er] mennesker af forståelse.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world is good, and the earth of Allah is spacious. Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account."
trans-unit.target: Sige, "O mine tjenere, som har ment, frygt jeres Herre. For dem, der gør godt i denne verden er god, og jorden af Allah er rummelige. Faktisk, patienten får deres belønning uden konto."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.
trans-unit.target: Sige, [O Muhammad], "Ja, jeg er blevet befalet at tilbede Allah, [der] oprigtig til ham i religion.

trans-unit.source: And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] of the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: Og jeg er blevet befalet at blive først [blandt jer] af muslimer."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
trans-unit.target: Sige, "Ja jeg er bange for, hvis jeg skulle adlyde min herre, straf af en enorm dag."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Allah [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,
trans-unit.target: Sige, "Allah [alene] har jeg tilbeder, oprigtig til ham i min religion,

trans-unit.source: So worship what you will besides Him." Say, "Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss."
trans-unit.target: Så tilbede hvad du vil udover ham." Sige, "Ja, taberne er dem, der vil miste sig selv og deres familier på dag i opstandelse. Utvivlsomt, det er åbenbart tab."

trans-unit.source: They will have canopies of fire above them and below them, canopies. By that Allah threatens His servants. O My servants, then fear Me.
trans-unit.target: De vil have baldakiner i brand over dem og under dem, baldakiner. Ved, at Allah truer hans tjenere. O bange mine tjenere, så for mig.

trans-unit.source: But those who have avoided Taghut, lest they worship it, and turned back to Allah - for them are good tidings. So give good tidings to My servants
trans-unit.target: Men dem, der har undgået Taghut, lest de tilbede det, og vendte tilbage til Allah - for dem er gode tidender. Så give gode tidender til mine tjenere

trans-unit.source: Who listen to speech and follow the best of it. Those are the ones Allah has guided, and those are people of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Hvem lytter til tale og følg bedst af det. De er dem, Allah har styret, og dem er folk af forståelse.

trans-unit.source: Then, is one who has deserved the decree of punishment [to be guided]? Then, can you save one who is in the Fire?
trans-unit.target: Derefter, er en der har fortjent dekret af straf [at blive guidet]? Derefter kan du gemme en, der er i ilden?

trans-unit.source: But those who have feared their Lord - for them are chambers, above them chambers built high, beneath which rivers flow. [This is] the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in [His] promise.
trans-unit.target: Men dem, der har frygtet deres Herre - for dem er kamre, over dem kamre bygget højt, under hvilke floder flow. [Det er] løftet om Allah. Allah svigter ikke i [hans] løfte.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky and makes it flow as springs [and rivers] in the earth; then He produces thereby crops of varying colors; then they dry and you see them turned yellow; then He makes them [scattered] debris. Indeed in that is a reminder for those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke se at Allah sender ned regn fra himlen og gør det flow som fjedre [og floder] i jorden; derefter producerer han derved afgrøder af varierende farver; så de tørre og du kan se dem vendt gule; så han gør dem [spredt] debris. Faktisk er i, en påmindelse til dem af forståelse.

trans-unit.source: So is one whose breast Allah has expanded to [accept] Islam and he is upon a light from his Lord [like one whose heart rejects it]? Then woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the remembrance of Allah. Those are in manifest error.
trans-unit.target: Så er en hvis bryst Allah har udvidet [acceptere] Islam og han er på en lys fra sin herre [som en hvis hjerte afviser det]? Derefter ve til dem, hvis hjerte er forhærdet mod erindringen om Allah. Disse er i åbenbar fejl.

trans-unit.source: Allah has sent down the best statement: a consistent Book wherein is reiteration. The skins shiver therefrom of those who fear their Lord; then their skins and their hearts relax at the remembrance of Allah. That is the guidance of Allah by which He guides whom He wills. And one whom Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.
trans-unit.target: Allah har sendt ned den bedste erklæring: en konsekvent bog hvori er gentagelse. Skind gysen af dem, der frygter deres Herre; så deres skind og deres hjerter slappe af på erindringen om Allah. Der er vejledning af Allah som han guider hvem han Testamente. Og en som Allah blade på afveje - for ham der er ikke guide.

trans-unit.source: Then is he who will shield with his face the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection [like one secure from it]? And it will be said to the wrongdoers, "Taste what you used to earn."
trans-unit.target: Derefter er han, der vil beskytte med hans ansigt værst straf på den dag i opstandelse [som en sikker fra det]? Og det vil sige, at lovovertrædere, "smage hvad du har brugt til at tjene."

trans-unit.source: Those before them denied, and punishment came upon them from where they did not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Dem foran dem nægtet, og straf kom over dem fra hvor de ikke opfatter.

trans-unit.source: So Allah made them taste disgrace in worldly life. But the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.
trans-unit.target: Så Allah gjorde dem smage skændsel i verdslige liv. Men straffen i hinsidige er større, hvis de kun vidste.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example - that they might remember.
